Articles.Content:
Modlist

I have 8 gigs and running windows 7. I seem to crash randomly in flight. Even I lose a kerbal or spaceship it wont let me revert without crashing.

Edited February 14, 2015 by Master Tao
fix [IMG] link

Given the mods you have installed, it's likely you're running out of memory. The supported version of KSP on Windows is a 32-bit process, so it's limited to less than 4 GB of RAM.

We can verify that if you provide a log as requested in the How to Get Support (READ FIRST) sticky at the top of this forum. That thread also has advice on how to handle the issue.
